title: MOCA ONT UNI CONFIGURATION COMMAND
description: This command configures a MoCA ONT uni.
user_level:
The command can be accessed by operators with equipment privileges, and 
executed by operators with equipment privileges.
syntax: > configure moca ont (uni-idx) [ no cust-info | cust-info <Gpon::CustInfo> ] [ no tx-pwr | tx-pwr <Moca::TxPwr> ] [ no net-coord | net-coord <Moca::NetworkCoordinator> ] [ no snr-margin | snr-margin <Moca::SignalToNoiseRatioMargin> ] [ no password | password <Moca::Password> ] [ no privacy | privacy <Moca::Privacy> ] [ no bw-alarm-thresh | bw-alarm-thresh <Moca::minBwAlarmThreshold> ] [ no auto-pwr-ctl | auto-pwr-ctl <Moca::AutomaticPowerControl> ] [ no pwr-override | pwr-override <Gpon::PowerShedOverride> ] [ no admin-state | admin-state <Gpon::ItfAdminStatus> ]

resource_parameters.name: (uni-idx)
resource_parameters.description: identification of the uni interface index

command_parameters.name: [no] cust-info
command_parameters.description: port label optional parameter with default value: "" - a printable string - length: x<=80

command_parameters.name: [no] tx-pwr
command_parameters.description: target transmitter power level (dBm) optional parameter with default value: -14L - transmitter power level in dBm - range: [-31...0]

command_parameters.name: [no] net-coord
command_parameters.description: moca network coordinating role optional parameter with default value: "auto"
values: always                : always be the network coordinator
never                 : never be the network coordinator

command_parameters.name: [no] snr-margin
command_parameters.description: margin above Rx noise floor for variations in return loss (dBm) optional parameter with default value: 2L - threshold above measured rx noise floor in dDm - range: [-3...3]

command_parameters.name: [no] password
command_parameters.description: hidden moca encryption key (0-17 numeric characters) optional parameter with default value: "" - hidden moca encryption key - length: x<=17

command_parameters.name: [no] privacy
command_parameters.description: link layer security optional parameter with default value: "disable"

command_parameters.name: [no] bw-alarm-thresh
command_parameters.description: minimum phy link bandwidth between two nodes (Mbps) optional parameter with default value: 180L
values: disable               : disable bw threshold alarm Field type <Moca::minBwAlarmThreshold>
minimum phy link bandwidth (Mbps) between two nodes

command_parameters.name: [no] auto-pwr-ctl
command_parameters.description: automatic power control optional parameter with default value: "enable"

command_parameters.name: [no] pwr-override
command_parameters.description: power shed override optional parameter with default value: "disable"
values: enable                : port is excluded from data class power shedding
disable               : port is included in data class power shedding

command_parameters.name: [no] admin-state
command_parameters.description: administrative status of the interface optional parameter with default value: "down" Table "MoCA ONT Uni Configuration Command" Display Parameters Specific Information:
values: up                    : set the admin-state to up
down                  : set the admin-state to down

command_parameters.name: oper-state
command_parameters.description: operational state of the interface This element is always shown. ( up | down | testing | unknown | dormant | no-value )
values: no-value              : no entry in the table

raw:
help configure moca ont
MOCA ONT UNI CONFIGURATION COMMAND
==================================

Command Description
-------------------

This command configures a MoCA ONT uni.


User Level
----------

The command can be accessed by operators with equipment privileges, and 
executed by operators with equipment privileges.

Command Syntax
--------------

The command has the following syntax:
> configure moca ont (uni-idx) [ no cust-info | cust-info <Gpon::CustInfo> ] [ 
no tx-pwr | tx-pwr <Moca::TxPwr> ] [ no net-coord | net-coord 
<Moca::NetworkCoordinator> ] [ no snr-margin | snr-margin 
<Moca::SignalToNoiseRatioMargin> ] [ no password | password <Moca::Password> ] 
[ no privacy | privacy <Moca::Privacy> ] [ no bw-alarm-thresh | bw-alarm-thresh 
<Moca::minBwAlarmThreshold> ] [ no auto-pwr-ctl | auto-pwr-ctl 
<Moca::AutomaticPowerControl> ] [ no pwr-override | pwr-override 
<Gpon::PowerShedOverride> ] [ no admin-state | admin-state 
<Gpon::ItfAdminStatus> ]

Command Parameters
------------------

Table "MoCA ONT Uni Configuration Command" Resource Parameters

Resource Identifier        Description

(uni-idx)                  identification of the uni interface index

Table "MoCA ONT Uni Configuration Command" Command Parameters

Parameter                  Description

[no] cust-info             port label
                           optional parameter with default value: ""

                           Parameter type: <Gpon::CustInfo>
                           Format:
                           - a printable string
                           - length: x<=80 

[no] tx-pwr                target transmitter power level (dBm)
                           optional parameter with default value: -14L

                           Parameter type: <Moca::TxPwr>
                           Format:
                           - transmitter power level in dBm
                           - range: [-31...0]

[no] net-coord             moca network coordinating role
                           optional parameter with default value: "auto"

                           Parameter type: <Moca::NetworkCoordinator>
                           Format:
                           ( auto
                           | always
                           | never )
                           Possible values:
                           - auto                  : negotiate for network 
coordinator
                           - always                : always be the network 
coordinator
                           - never                 : never be the network 
coordinator

[no] snr-margin            margin above Rx noise floor for variations in return 
loss (dBm)
                           optional parameter with default value: 2L

                           Parameter type: <Moca::SignalToNoiseRatioMargin>
                           Format:
                           - threshold above measured rx noise floor in dDm
                           - range: [-3...3]

[no] password              hidden moca encryption key (0-17 numeric characters)
                           optional parameter with default value: ""

                           Parameter type: <Moca::Password>
                           Format:
                           - hidden moca encryption key
                           - length: x<=17 

[no] privacy               link layer security
                           optional parameter with default value: "disable"

                           Parameter type: <Moca::Privacy>
                           Format:
                           ( enable
                           | disable )
                           Possible values:
                           - enable                : link-layer security 
activated
                           - disable               : link-layer security 
deactivated

[no] bw-alarm-thresh       minimum phy link bandwidth between two nodes (Mbps)
                           optional parameter with default value: 180L

                           Parameter type: <Moca::minBwAlarmThreshold>
                           Format:
                           ( disable
                           | <Moca::minBwAlarmThreshold> )
                           Possible values:
                           - disable               : disable bw threshold alarm
                           Field type <Moca::minBwAlarmThreshold>
                           - minimum phy link bandwidth (Mbps) between two nodes
                           - range: [0,57...3200]

[no] auto-pwr-ctl          automatic power control
                           optional parameter with default value: "enable"

                           Parameter type: <Moca::AutomaticPowerControl>
                           Format:
                           ( enable
                           | disable )
                           Possible values:
                           - enable                : apc enabled
                           - disable               : apc disabled

[no] pwr-override          power shed override
                           optional parameter with default value: "disable"

                           Parameter type: <Gpon::PowerShedOverride>
                           Format:
                           ( enable
                           | disable )
                           Possible values:
                           - enable                : port is excluded from data 
class power shedding
                           - disable               : port is included in data 
class power shedding

[no] admin-state           administrative status of the interface
                           optional parameter with default value: "down"

                           Parameter type: <Gpon::ItfAdminStatus>
                           Format:
                           ( up
                           | down )
                           Possible values:
                           - up                    : set the admin-state to up
                           - down                  : set the admin-state to down


Table "MoCA ONT Uni Configuration Command" Display Parameters

Specific Information:

Parameter                  Description

 oper-state                operational state of the interface
                           This element is always shown.

                           parameter type: <Itf::ifOperStatus>
                           ( up
                           | down
                           | testing
                           | unknown
                           | dormant
                           | no-value )
                           Possible values:
                           - up                    : up,traffic can pass
                           - down                  : down,no traffic is passing
                           - testing               : testing,no traffic is 
passing
                           - unknown               : unknown
                           - dormant               : dormant,no traffic is 
passing
                           - no-value              : no entry in the table

DS-LIN-TEST-01:automationuser>#
